props.backgroundColor: The color used for empty items
props.clearable: Allows for the component to be cleared by clicking on the current value
props.halfIcon: The icon displayed when half (requires **half-increments** prop)
props.halfIncrements: Allows the selection of half increments
props.hover: Provides visual feedback when hovering over icons
props.length: The amount of items to show
props.readonly: Removes all hover effects and pointer events
props.itemLabels: Array of labels to display next to each item.
props.itemLabelPosition: Position of item labels. Accepts 'top' and 'bottom'.

slots.item-label: The slot for each item label

events.update:modelValue: Emits the rating number when this value changes
